root: ^Deep breathes Mercury, you've been working your whole life for this moment
^Touchdown on a foreign world, one of which I have only heard stories and legends about…
^40 feet, down 2.5. Picking up some dust.
^… everyone is cheering you on, and waiti-
^Mommm, Mercury is talking to himself again

^Come on now, you know your brother does that all the time, plus you should cherish this time, because you won’t be seeing him very often now that he's in Uni. VIT is just so far that its not easy to come see him often…
^Hah, like I will, he's so annoying.
^Sunny, listen to your mother, and be a little proud of your brother, he made it into the Sci-On program, thats quite the accomplishment you know.
